title: Akshay Kumar Is Set To Play Gulshan Kumar In A Biopic Based On The Music Mogul's Life

The film also brings together Akshay and his Jolly LLB 2 director, Subhash Kapoor, who said "I always told my team that the one story I would love to make a movie on was Gulshan ji's and here I am doing just that." And in a statement, Akshay said of the film, "I had the good fortune of knowing Gulshan ji well, and had a close association with him right from my first film Saugandh. We both shared many things in common, and come from a similar background. I am very excited to play him on screen." The film is being produced by Gulshan Kumar's own wife, Sudesh Kumari, and son, Bhushan Kumar, who currently runs the T-Series.
